PAGES_MANAGER.MAIN_EXPLANATION: Create new pages with our drag & drop builder that gives you total control of each detail of your page. You can use one of our templates or branch out of it. You can start from scretch and compose a layout using our components.
PAGES_MANAGER.PAGES_HEADER: You haven't used the Page Builder yet
PAGES_MANAGER.NO_PAGES_MSG: Add a custom page design by clicking the ‘Add Page’ button, or import an existing template through the adjacent Menu button
PAGES_MANAGER.LINKS_PUBLISH: Publish page for use in configurations
PAGES_MANAGER.DELETE_PAGE_MSG: Are you sure you want to delete this page ?

ADD_NEW.EXPLANATION: Here is weher you configuier your deisgn instead of Pepperi’s lagacy design. Short ribs short loin shankle cow chuck pork belly. Spare ribs filet mignon t-bone jerky prosciutto. Ground round meatball corned beef pastrami venison.

PARAMETER_VALIDATION.TYPE_IS_DIFFERENT_FOR_THIS_KEY: The page configuration object of this block has Parameters with different Type for the key '{{parameterKey}}'.
PARAMETER_VALIDATION.CONSUME_AND_PRODUCE_ARE_FALSE: The page configuration object of this block has parameter (with key '{{parameterKey}}') that is not allowed, at least on of the properties Produce or Consume should be true.

The data is conflict between the page configuration object of this block and the existing block in section {{section}} -> column {{column}}.
The parameter with key '{{parameterKey}}' exist for Type {{parameterType}}.
